mapper.select: select categorySeq, name from tblCategory order by categorySeq

select * from ( select p.projectseq from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where f.regdate <= sysdate and f.regdate > sysdate - 7 and startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate and p.status = 'y' and p.deleteok = 'n' group by p.projectseq order by count(*) desc) where ROWNUM <= 4

select * from ( select p.projectseq from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where p.startdate <= sysdate and p.enddate >= sysdate and status = 'y' and deleteok = 'n' group by p.projectseq, p.target having p.target-sum(pp.price) > 0 order by p.target-sum(pp.price)) where ROWNUM <= 4
select * from ( select projectseq from tblProject where startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate and status = 'y' and deleteok = 'n' order by TRUNC(sysdate)-startdate) where rownum <= 4

select p.projectseq, p.name, p.teamname, m.name as userName, enddate-TRUNC(sysdate) as meantime, p.target, p.thumImage from tblProject p inner join tblMember m on m.memberseq = p.memberseq where projectseq = #{seq}

select sum(pp.price) as totalPrice from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where p.projectseq = #{seq} group by p.projectseq order by p.projectseq
select projectseq from tblProject where categoryseq = #{categoryseq} and startdate <= sysdate and enddate >= sysdate and status = 'y' and deleteok = 'n' order by projectseq
select name from tblcategory where categoryseq = #{categoryseq}

select p.*, m.name as userName, c.name as categoryName, p.enddate-TRUNC(sysdate) as meantime from tblProject p inner join tblmember m on p.memberseq = m.memberseq inner join tblcategory c on p.categoryseq = c.categoryseq where projectseq = #{projectseq}

select count(distinct f.memberseq) totalMember from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq where p.projectseq = #{projectseq} order by f.memberseq

select count(gender) from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq inner join tblMember m on f.memberseq = m.memberseq where p.projectseq = #{projectseq} group by gender order by gender

select ageGroup, count(*) ageGroupCnt from ( select (case when birth >= 10 and birth < 20 then '10대' when birth >= 20 and birth < 30 then '20대' when birth >= 30 and birth < 40 then '30대' when birth >= 40 and birth < 50 then '40대' when birth >= 50 then '50대 이상' end) ageGroup from (select (2021-(case when substr(birth, 0, 1) in ('0', '1', '2') then '20' || substr(birth, 0, 2) else '19' || substr(birth, 0, 2) end) + 1) as birth from tblFunding f inner join tblProjectPack pp on pp.packageseq = f.packageseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = pp.projectseq inner join tblMember m on f.memberseq = m.memberseq where p.projectseq = #{projectseq}) ) group by ageGroup order by ageGroup
select * from tblnotice where projectseq = #{projectseq} order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into tblQA (qaSeq, content, sMemberSeq, rMemberSeq) values (QaSeq.nextVal, #{content}, #{sMemberSeq}, #{rMemberSeq})
